metadata.title: CVE-2024-28570 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in open source FreeImage v.3.19.0 [r1909]allows a local attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) via theprocessMakerNote() function when reading images in JPEG format.

criterions.comment: freeimage package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
